keys-in-react.title: Keys in React (todo)
keys-in-react.subtitle: Why using an index is sometimes not enough
keys-in-react.description: What are keys in React? What is their purpose, why are they important and why using an index is sometimes not enough.
keys-in-react.description2: Understanding keys is crucial to developing a better mental model in React.
